summary: The diff only modifies a project_state.json file, recording the deployment requirement as 'pending'. No actual deployment configuration files (dfx.json, canister IDs, CI/CD scripts, environment configs, etc.) were added or modified. None of the acceptance criteria for REQ-1 are implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy the backend Motoko canister to the IC mainnet so it is running and publicly accessible.
missing_requirements.reason: No deployment artifacts, dfx.json mainnet configuration, canister IDs, or deployment scripts were added or modified. The project_state.json only marks the requirement as 'pending'.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy the frontend to the IC mainnet and make it accessible via a public IC URL.
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend deployment configuration, asset canister setup, or public URL evidence is present in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure all existing features (marketplace listings, service listings, papers upload, video sharing, admin dashboard, user profiles, meetup tracker) are functional on the live deployment.
missing_requirements.reason: No deployment was performed, so functionality on the live deployment cannot be verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Internet Identity authentication works on the live deployment.
missing_requirements.reason: No configuration for Internet Identity on mainnet (e.g., production canister IDs, auth client configuration) was added or modified.
